name: Engineering Fundamentals
description: Core concepts and basics for all engineering disciplines.

name: Mechanical Engineering Basics
description: Learn thermodynamics, mechanics, and design principles.

name: Electrical Engineering Principles
description: Circuits, electronics, and power systems foundations.

name: Civil and Structural Engineering
description: Introduction to civil, construction, and environmental systems.

name: Software Engineering for Engineers
description: Understand software systems design and application development.

name: Advanced Engineering Mathematics
description: Essential mathematical tools for advanced engineering analysis.

name: Finite Element Methods in Engineering
description: Study numerical techniques for complex systems and materials.

name: Control Systems Engineering
description: Learn how to design and analyze control systems for machines.

name: Advanced Materials Science
description: Explore the microstructure, processing, and application of materials.

name: Renewable and Sustainable Energy Engineering
description: Modern approaches to clean energy and environmental systems.

name: Research Methods in Engineering
description: Learn advanced methodologies for conducting engineering research.

name: Data-Driven Science and Engineering
description: Machine learning and data science tools for engineering applications.

name: Advanced Robotics Systems
description: Explore intelligent robotics and autonomous systems design.

name: Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD)
description: Advanced modeling of fluid mechanics and heat transfer.

name: Engineering Ethics and Innovation
description: Critical thinking on ethics, innovation, and research responsibility.
